word: H8610 - תָּפַשׂ - tâphas - taw-fas' - Catch - பிடி

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பிடி, வழங்கு, வசமாயிரு, பிடிபடு, கையாடு, போதி, வலி, மூடப்படு, சவவேதனை,அகப்படு, வலையைப்பிண்ணு
to catch, to handle, to lay hold, to take hold of, to seize, to wield
1) to lay hold of, to seize, to arrest, to catch
2) to grasp (in order to) wield, to wield, to use skillfully
b) (Niphal) to be seized, to be arrested, to be caught, to be taken, to be captured
c) (Piel) to catch, to grasp (with the hands)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to manipulate, that is, seize; chiefly to capture, wield; specifically to overlay; figuratively to use unwarrantably: - catch, handle, (lay, take) hold (on, over), stop, X surely, surprise, take.
Cognate: H8610, H8612, H8613
